JOB DESCRIPTION: Qualification :  BE/B.Tech/ME/M.Tech/BCA/MCA/BSc MSc IT/Diploma    Job Responsibilities      Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.     Ensure best possible performance, quality and Responsiveness of applications.     Identify bottlenecks and bugs and provide solutions.     Help maintain code quality and performance.    Job Requirements      Core web development skills in .NET technology frameworks including:     C Sharp (C#.Net)     ASP.Net     MVC     JavaScript, Jquery, CSS, HTML     LINQ, Entity Framework and Web API experience would be an added advantage.     Should have knowledge of Visual Studio, XHTML/XML, AJAX, N-Hibernate.     Angular JS experience would be an added advantage.     Systems analysis and design     Coding for development, maintenance, and functionality updates     Working with C#, SQL, MySQL, and related development tools     Maximizing usability for end users     Integrating new technologies into system design     Additional duties as per need basis     Strong knowledge of SQL Server and MySQL

EDUCATION.UG: B.Sc in Chemistry, BCA in Computers, Diploma in Mechanical, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial
